verses.verse: Now the children <S%H1121><s%> of Reuben <S%H7205><s%> and the children <S%H1121><s%> of Gad <S%H1410><s%> had a very <S%H3966><s%> great <S%H6099><s%> multitude <S%H7227><s%> of livestock: <S%H4735><s%> and when they saw <S%H7200><s%> the land <S%H776><s%> of Jazer, <S%H3270><s%> and the land <S%H776><s%> of Gilead, <S%H1568><s%> that behold, <S%H4725><s%> the place was a place <S%H4725><s%> for livestock; <S%H4735><s%>

the children <S%H1121><s%> of Gad <S%H1410><s%> and the children <S%H1121><s%> of Reuben <S%H7205><s%> came <S%H935><s%> and spoke <S%H559><s%> to Moses, <S%H4872><s%> and to Eleazar <S%H499><s%> the priest, <S%H3548><s%> and to the princes <S%H5387><s%> of the congregation, <S%H5712><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%>

"Ataroth, <S%H5852><s%> and Dibon, <S%H1769><s%> and Jazer, <S%H3270><s%> and Nimrah, <S%H5247><s%> and Heshbon, <S%H2809><s%> and Elealeh, <S%H500><s%> and Sebam, <S%H7643><s%> and Nebo, <S%H5015><s%> and Beon, <S%H1194><s%>

the land <S%H776><s%> which Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> struck <S%H5221><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the congregation <S%H5712><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> is a land <S%H776><s%> for livestock; <S%H4735><s%> and your servants <S%H5650><s%> have livestock. <S%H4735><s%>"

They said, <S%H559><s%> "If we have found <S%H4672><s%> favor <S%H2580><s%> in your sight, <S%H5869><s%> let this land <S%H776><s%> be given <S%H5414><s%> to your servants <S%H5650><s%> for a possession; <S%H272><s%> don't <S%H5674><s%> bring us over the Jordan. <S%H3383><s%>"

Moses <S%H4872><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to the children <S%H1121><s%> of Gad, <S%H1410><s%> and to the children <S%H1121><s%> of Reuben, <S%H7205><s%> "Shall your brothers <S%H251><s%> go <S%H935><s%> to the war, <S%H4421><s%> and shall you sit here? <S%H3427><s%>

Why do you <S%H5106><s%> discourage the heart <S%H3820><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> from going over <S%H5674><s%> into the land <S%H776><s%> which Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> has given them? <S%H5414><s%>
Your fathers <S%H1><s%> did <S%H6213><s%> so when I sent <S%H7971><s%> them from Kadesh <S%H6947><s%> Barnea to see <S%H7200><s%> the land. <S%H776><s%>

For when they went up <S%H5927><s%> to the valley <S%H5158><s%> of Eshcol, <S%H812><s%> and saw <S%H7200><s%> the land, <S%H776><s%> they discouraged <S%H5106><s%> the heart <S%H3820><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> that they should not go <S%H935><s%> into the land <S%H776><s%> which Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> had given them. <S%H5414><s%>
Yahweh <S%H3068><s%>'s anger <S%H639><s%> was kindled <S%H2734><s%> in that day, <S%H3117><s%> and he swore, <S%H7650><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%>

<S%H518><s%> 'Surely none of the men <S%H582><s%> who came up <S%H5927><s%> out of Egypt, <S%H4714><s%> from twenty <S%H6242><s%> years <S%H8141><s%> old <S%H1121><s%> and upward, <S%H4605><s%> shall see <S%H7200><s%> the land <S%H127><s%> which I swore <S%H7650><s%> to Abraham, <S%H85><s%> to Isaac, <S%H3327><s%> and to Jacob; <S%H3290><s%> because they have not wholly <S%H4390><s%> followed me: <S%H310><s%>

except Caleb <S%H3612><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Jephunneh <S%H3312><s%> the Kenizzite, <S%H7074><s%> and Joshua <S%H3091><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Nun; <S%H5126><s%> because they have followed <S%H310><s%> Yahweh completely. <S%H3068><s%>'

Yahweh <S%H3068><s%>'s anger <S%H639><s%> was kindled <S%H2734><s%> against Israel, <S%H3478><s%> and he made them wander <S%H5128><s%> back and forth in the wilderness <S%H4057><s%> forty <S%H705><s%> years, <S%H8141><s%> until all the generation, <S%H1755><s%> who had done <S%H6213><s%> evil <S%H7451><s%> in the sight <S%H5869><s%> of Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> was consumed. <S%H8552><s%>

"Behold, <S%H6965><s%> you have risen up in your fathers <S%H1><s%>' place, <S%H8635><s%> an increase of sinful <S%H2400><s%> men, <S%H582><s%> to augment <S%H5595><s%> yet the fierce <S%H2740><s%> anger <S%H639><s%> of Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> toward Israel. <S%H3478><s%>

For if you turn away <S%H7725><s%> from after <S%H310><s%> him, <S%H3254><s%> he will yet again leave <S%H3240><s%> them in the wilderness; <S%H4057><s%> and you will destroy <S%H7843><s%> all this people. <S%H5971><s%>"

They came near <S%H5066><s%> to him, <S%H559><s%> and said, "We will build <S%H1129><s%> sheepfolds <S%H1448><s%> here for our livestock, <S%H4735><s%> and cities <S%H5892><s%> for our little ones: <S%H2945><s%>

but we ourselves <S%H587><s%> will be ready <S%H2363><s%> armed <S%H2502><s%> to go before <S%H6440><s%> the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> until we have brought <S%H935><s%> them to their place: <S%H4725><s%> and our little ones <S%H2945><s%> shall dwell <S%H3427><s%> in the fortified <S%H4013><s%> cities <S%H5892><s%> because <S%H6440><s%> of the inhabitants <S%H3427><s%> of the land. <S%H776><s%>

We will not return <S%H7725><s%> to our houses, <S%H1004><s%> until the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> have inherited <S%H5157><s%> every man <S%H376><s%> his inheritance. <S%H5159><s%>

For we will not inherit <S%H5157><s%> with them on the other side <S%H5676><s%> of the Jordan, <S%H3383><s%> and forward; <S%H1973><s%> because our inheritance <S%H5159><s%> is fallen <S%H935><s%> to us on this side <S%H5676><s%> of the Jordan <S%H3383><s%> eastward. <S%H4217><s%>"

Moses <S%H4872><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to them, <S%H6213><s%> "If you will do this thing, <S%H1697><s%> if you will arm <S%H2502><s%> yourselves to go before <S%H6440><s%> Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> to the war, <S%H4421><s%>

and every armed <S%H2502><s%> man of you will pass <S%H5674><s%> over <S%H5674><s%> the Jordan <S%H3383><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> until he has driven out <S%H3423><s%> his enemies <S%H341><s%> from before him, <S%H6440><s%>

and the land <S%H776><s%> is subdued <S%H3533><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> Yahweh; <S%H3068><s%> then afterward <S%H310><s%> you shall return, <S%H7725><s%> and be guiltless <S%H5355><s%> towards Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> and towards Israel; <S%H3478><s%> and this land <S%H776><s%> shall be to you for a possession <S%H272><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> Yahweh. <S%H3068><s%>
"But if you will not do so, <S%H6213><s%> behold, <S%H2398><s%> you have sinned against Yahweh; <S%H3068><s%> and be sure <S%H3045><s%> your sin <S%H2403><s%> will find you out. <S%H4672><s%>

Build <S%H1129><s%> cities <S%H5892><s%> for your little ones, <S%H2945><s%> and folds <S%H1448><s%> for your sheep; <S%H6792><s%> and do <S%H6213><s%> that which has proceeded <S%H3318><s%> out of your mouth. <S%H6310><s%>"

The children <S%H1121><s%> of Gad <S%H1410><s%> and the children <S%H1121><s%> of Reuben <S%H7205><s%> spoke <S%H559><s%> to Moses, <S%H4872><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> "Your servants <S%H5650><s%> will do <S%H6213><s%> as my lord <S%H113><s%> commands. <S%H6680><s%>
Our little ones, <S%H2945><s%> our wives, <S%H802><s%> our flocks, <S%H4735><s%> and all our livestock, <S%H929><s%> shall be there in the cities <S%H5892><s%> of Gilead; <S%H1568><s%>

but your servants <S%H5650><s%> will pass over, <S%H5674><s%> every man who is armed <S%H2502><s%> for war, <S%H6635><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> to battle, <S%H4421><s%> as my lord <S%H3068><s%> says. <S%H1696><s%>"

So Moses <S%H4872><s%> commanded <S%H6680><s%> concerning them to Eleazar <S%H499><s%> the priest, <S%H3548><s%> and to Joshua <S%H3091><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Nun, <S%H5126><s%> and to the heads <S%H7218><s%> of the fathers <S%H1><s%>' households of the tribes <S%H4294><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel. <S%H3478><s%>

Moses <S%H4872><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to them, <S%H1121><s%> "If the children of Gad <S%H1410><s%> and the children <S%H1121><s%> of Reuben <S%H7205><s%> will pass with you over <S%H5674><s%> the Jordan, <S%H3383><s%> every man who is armed <S%H2502><s%> to battle, <S%H4421><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> and the land <S%H776><s%> shall be subdued <S%H3533><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> you; <S%H5414><s%> then you shall give them the land <S%H776><s%> of Gilead <S%H1568><s%> for a possession: <S%H272><s%>
but if they will not pass over <S%H5674><s%> with you armed, <S%H2502><s%> they shall have possessions <S%H270><s%> among <S%H8432><s%> you in the land <S%H776><s%> of Canaan. <S%H3667><s%>"

The children <S%H1121><s%> of Gad <S%H1410><s%> and the children <S%H1121><s%> of Reuben <S%H7205><s%> answered, <S%H6030><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> "As Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> has said <S%H1696><s%> to your servants, <S%H5650><s%> so will we do. <S%H6213><s%>

We will <S%H5168><s%> pass over <S%H5674><s%> armed <S%H2502><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> into the land <S%H776><s%> of Canaan, <S%H3667><s%> and the possession <S%H272><s%> of our inheritance <S%H5159><s%> shall remain with us beyond <S%H5676><s%> the Jordan. <S%H3383><s%>"

Moses <S%H4872><s%> gave <S%H5414><s%> to them, <S%H1121><s%> even to the children of Gad, <S%H1410><s%> and to the children <S%H1121><s%> of Reuben, <S%H7205><s%> and to the half <S%H2677><s%> - tribe <S%H7626><s%> of Manasseh <S%H4519><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Joseph, <S%H3130><s%> the kingdom <S%H4467><s%> of Sihon <S%H5511><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> of the Amorites, <S%H567><s%> and the kingdom <S%H4467><s%> of Og <S%H5747><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> of Bashan, <S%H1316><s%> the land, <S%H776><s%> according to its cities <S%H5892><s%> and borders, <S%H1367><s%> even the cities <S%H5892><s%> of the surrounding <S%H5439><s%> land. <S%H776><s%>
The children <S%H1121><s%> of Gad <S%H1410><s%> built <S%H1129><s%> Dibon, <S%H1769><s%> and Ataroth, <S%H5852><s%> and Aroer, <S%H6177><s%>
and Atrothshophan, <S%H5855><s%> and Jazer, <S%H3270><s%> and Jogbehah, <S%H3011><s%>
and Beth Nimrah, <S%H1039><s%> and Beth Haran: <S%H1028><s%> fortified <S%H4013><s%> cities, <S%H5892><s%> and folds <S%H1448><s%> for sheep. <S%H6629><s%>
The children <S%H1121><s%> of Reuben <S%H7205><s%> built <S%H1129><s%> Heshbon, <S%H2809><s%> and Elealeh, <S%H500><s%> and Kiriathaim, <S%H7156><s%>

and Nebo, <S%H5015><s%> and Baal Meon, <S%H1186><s%> (their names <S%H8034><s%> being changed <S%H4142><s%>), and Sibmah: <S%H7643><s%> and they gave <S%H7121><s%> other names <S%H8034><s%> to the cities <S%H5892><s%> which they built. <S%H1129><s%>

The children <S%H1121><s%> of Machir <S%H4353><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Manasseh <S%H4519><s%> went <S%H3212><s%> to Gilead, <S%H1568><s%> and took <S%H3920><s%> it, <S%H3423><s%> and dispossessed the Amorites who were therein. <S%H567><s%>
Moses <S%H4872><s%> gave <S%H5414><s%> Gilead <S%H1568><s%> to Machir <S%H4353><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Manasseh; <S%H4519><s%> and he lived therein. <S%H3427><s%>
Jair <S%H2971><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Manasseh <S%H4519><s%> went <S%H1980><s%> and took <S%H3920><s%> its towns, <S%H2333><s%> and called <S%H7121><s%> them Havvoth Jair. <S%H2334><s%>
Nobah <S%H5025><s%> went <S%H1980><s%> and took <S%H3920><s%> Kenath, <S%H7079><s%> and its villages, <S%H1323><s%> and called <S%H7121><s%> it Nobah, <S%H5025><s%> after his own name. <S%H8034><s%>
